document_data.name: Zhentilar Headquarters
document_data.mainbody: The '''Zhentilar Headquarters''' was the base of operations for the [[Zhentilar]] in [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Headquarters was located in south Zhentil Keep in the central section of the [[Zhentil Keep/Foreign Quarter|Foreign Quarter]] along [[Zhent Avenue]].
document_data.Interior: A massive armory was located beneath the building. This area also contained cells reserved for soldiers who broke their oaths and citizens suspected of treason.
document_data.Inhabitants: Captain [[Ulgrym]] commanded the soldiers stationed here as of the {{YearlinkName|1369}}.
document_data.Defenses: 750 Zhentilar soldiers were stationed within the headquarters or at a nearby barracks.
document_data.History: The building served as an armory before the destruction of the city in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}.
